mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Atcheson, Samuel
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Atcheson, Samuel Patient Age: 19. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound flesh, ball entered half inch from the interior border of the latisimus [latissimus] dorsal muscle ten inches interior of sae muscle and lodged in left side of chest. Ball not found. Result: Returned to duty by order of board of inspectors of US Gen Hospitals.
